metadata.title: CVE-2019-13743 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in external protocol handling in Google Chrome priorto 79.0.3945.79 allowed a remote attacker to spoof security UI via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
